group.cs242.beatblocks

Class Beat

  • java.lang.Object
    • group.cs242.beatblocks.Beat

  • public class Beat
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Cameron Icso Represents an idividual Beat to be used in the BeatMap

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int beat_width
      The width of the beat
      (package private) int cent
      The horizontal center of the beat
      (package private) ValueAnimator centAnim
      The Animator of the beat.
      (package private) Rect rectangle
      The rectangle that represents the position of the beat
      (package private) boolean used
      Represents if the beat has been used or not
      (package private) int width
      The width of the view

      Starts the animator
      boolean getUsed() 
      void onAnimationUpdate(ValueAnimator animation)
      Updates the right and left values of the rectangle as the center value is animated If the beat gets to the end and is used, the beat will be set to unused.

      Sets the beat's used value

    • Constructor Detail

      • Beat

        Beat(int left,
     int top,
     int right,
     int bottom,
     long time_delay,
     long duration,
     int bw,
     int w)
        Constructor, initializes the data members, and sets up the Animator
        Parameters:
        left - - the left edge of the beat
        top - - the top edge of the beat
        right - - the right edge of the beat
        bottom - - the bottom edge of the beat
        time_delay - - the time-delay for the animation in milliseconds
        duration - - the duration of the animation in milliseconds
        bw - - the width of the beat
        w - - the width of the view

    • Method Detail

      • getUsed

        public boolean getUsed()
        Returns:
        if the beat has been used

      • setUsed

        public void setUsed(boolean u)
        Sets the beat's used value
        Parameters:
        u - - a boolean value for if the beat should be used or not

      • update

        public void update(int t,
                   int b)
        Updates the top and bottom of the rectangle
        Parameters:
        t - - top value
        b - - bottom value

      • onAnimationUpdate

        public void onAnimationUpdate(ValueAnimator animation)
        Updates the right and left values of the rectangle as the center value is animated If the beat gets to the end and is used, the beat will be set to unused. If the beat is unused, game will be over
        Parameters:
        animation - - The animation that will be used

      • Animate

        void Animate()
        Starts the animator
